item.title: WBD
item.description: score:-36 Chances: Warner Bros. Discovery’s involvement in streaming services positions it well to benefit from the growing demand for digital content. The success of the ‘Barbie’ movie and Margot Robbie’s earnings showcase the potential for strong revenue streams from successful film projects. Expanding pricing and packages for streaming services like NFL+ could provide Warner Bros.
